Name: Seek Not a Lighthouse
About the game: Do you have what it takes to save the island when all hope is lost? A TRAVELER, SEEKING TO AVENGE THE DEATH OF A BROKEN MAN HE NEVER KNEW... ----------------------------------------------------------------------------- After they stopped receiving communications from the creature below, all hope was lost, with the final message warning the islanders to be aware of what, or who, was to come... Little did they know that the Silent Traveler -- you -- would be their last hope in solving the mystery of what happened to the creature, who was behind it all, and the connections between the events. Play as both the titular 'Silent Traveler' and an islander from two distinctly different time periods Point and click through a retro adventure like no other Solve puzzles and interact with a cast of bizarre characters
